basses.description: A high-performance 5-string bass guitar with a mahogany neck and ash body. Featuring a pair of humbucking pickups and a 3-band EQ.

audio-interfaces.name: Aurora AI-4
audio-interfaces.description: A compact 4-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Ideal for solo artists and small studios.

audio-interfaces.name: Apex AI-8
audio-interfaces.description: A professional 8-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and Thunderbolt connectivity. Suitable for large studios and live sound applications.

audio-interfaces.name: Pulse AI-2
audio-interfaces.description: A portable 2-channel audio interface with 24-bit/96kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Perfect for musicians on-the-go.

audio-interfaces.name: Sonic AI-6
audio-interfaces.description: A high-end 6-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Ideal for professional studios and producers.

audio-interfaces.name: Fusion AI-4
audio-interfaces.description: A compact 4-channel audio interface with 24-bit/96kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Suitable for small studios and home recording.

audio-interfaces.name: Proxima AI-8
audio-interfaces.description: A professional 8-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and Thunderbolt connectivity. Ideal for large studios and live sound applications.

audio-interfaces.name: Nova AI-2
audio-interfaces.description: A compact 2-channel audio interface with 24-bit/96kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Perfect for solo artists and small studios.

audio-interfaces.name: Vista AI-6
audio-interfaces.description: A high-end 6-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Suitable for professional studios and producers.

audio-interfaces.name: Lumina AI-4
audio-interfaces.description: A compact 4-channel audio interface with 24-bit/96kHz resolution and USB connectivity. Ideal for small studios and home recording.

audio-interfaces.name: Axiom AI-8
audio-interfaces.description: A professional 8-channel audio interface with 24-bit/192kHz resolution and Thunderbolt connectivity. Suitable for large studios and live sound applications.

effect-pedals.name: Tone Titan Overdrive
effect-pedals.description: A high-gain overdrive pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 3-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Bassquake Subsonic Distortion
effect-pedals.description: A high-output distortion pedal designed specifically for bass guitar. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in low-end boost.

effect-pedals.name: Echoflux Delay
effect-pedals.description: A versatile delay pedal with a wide range of delay times and tonal options. Features a built-in looper and a tap tempo function.

effect-pedals.name: Fuzzzilla Fuzz Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A high-gain fuzz pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Reverbomatic Spring Reverb
effect-pedals.description: A high-quality spring reverb pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a built-in tremolo circuit and a 3-spring tank.

effect-pedals.name: Phaser Phrenzy Phaser Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A versatile phaser pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Compressor Pro Compression Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A high-quality compression pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in limiter circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Wah Wah Wizard Wah Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A high-quality wah pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Chorus Champion Chorus Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A versatile chorus pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

effect-pedals.name: Flanger Frenzy Flanger Pedal
effect-pedals.description: A high-quality flanger pedal with a wide range of tonal options. Features a 2-band EQ and a built-in boost circuit.

microphones.name: Aurora AX-1 Condenser Microphone
microphones.description: A high-quality condenser microphone with a wide frequency response and low self-noise. Ideal for studio recording and live performances.

microphones.name: Apex AP-55 Dynamic Microphone
microphones.description: A rugged and reliable dynamic microphone with a cardioid polar pattern and high SPL handling. Perfect for live performances and public speaking.

microphones.name: Pulse PM-7 Ribbon Microphone
microphones.description: A high-end ribbon microphone with a warm and smooth sound. Ideal for studio recording and capturing delicate vocals and instruments.

microphones.name: Sonic SS-1 USB Microphone
microphones.description: A plug-and-play USB microphone with a condenser capsule and built-in headphone amplifier. Perfect for podcasting, voiceovers, and online conferencing.

microphones.name: Fusion FM-2 Wireless Microphone
microphones.description: A reliable and easy-to-use wireless microphone system with a compact receiver and long battery life. Ideal for live performances and public speaking.

microphones.name: Triton TT-3 Shotgun Microphone
microphones.description: A high-quality shotgun microphone with a supercardioid polar pattern and high SPL handling. Perfect for film and television production, as well as live performances.

microphones.name: Lumina LM-1 Lavalier Microphone
microphones.description: A compact and lightweight lavalier microphone with a omnidirectional polar pattern and long battery life. Ideal for public speaking, film, and television production.

microphones.name: Voyager VM-2 Vocal Microphone
microphones.description: A high-quality dynamic microphone with a cardioid polar pattern and high SPL handling. Perfect for live performances and studio recording.

microphones.name: Pinnacle PM-9 Large Diaphragm Microphone
microphones.description: A high-end large diaphragm microphone with a wide frequency response and low self-noise. Ideal for studio recording and capturing delicate vocals and instruments.

microphones.name: Apex AP-77 Instrument Microphone
microphones.description: A rugged and reliable dynamic microphone with a cardioid polar pattern and high SPL handling. Perfect for capturing loud instruments such as drums and guitar amps.

percussion.name: Thunderbolt TB-5 Drumkit
percussion.description: A high-quality 5-piece drumkit with a mahogany shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 22" bass drum, 10" and 12" rack toms, 16" floor tom, and 14" snare drum.

percussion.name: Pulse PD-4 Bongo Set
percussion.description: A high-quality bongo set with a durable wood shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 7" and 8.5" bongo drum.

percussion.name: Apex AP-6 Conga Set
percussion.description: A high-quality conga set with a durable wood shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 10", 11", and 12" conga drum.

percussion.name: Sonic SS-1 Snare Drum
percussion.description: A high-quality 14" snare drum with a mahogany shell and chrome hardware.

percussion.name: Fusion FM-5 Drumkit
percussion.description: A high-quality 5-piece drumkit with a birch shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 22" bass drum, 10" and 12" rack toms, 16" floor tom, and 14" snare drum.

percussion.name: Triton TT-3 Timbale Set
percussion.description: A high-quality timbale set with a durable steel shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 13", 14", and 15" timbale drum.

percussion.name: Lumina LM-1 Cajon
percussion.description: A high-quality cajon with a durable wood shell and chrome hardware.

percussion.name: Voyager VM-2 Drum Pad
percussion.description: A high-quality drum pad with a durable rubber surface and adjustable sensitivity.

percussion.name: Pinnacle PM-9 Drumkit
percussion.description: A high-end 9-piece drumkit with a mahogany shell and chrome hardware. Includes a 24" bass drum, 12" and 13" rack toms, 16" and 18" floor toms, and 14" snare drum.

percussion.name: Apex AP-77 Tambourine
percussion.description: A high-quality tambourine with a durable steel shell and chrome hardware.
